name: Of Dice And BAM
description:
A game by Charlie Kolb with audio by different artists listed below for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with theme "Roll Of The Dice".

Audio from freesound.org/people/..

  • sirkoto51: Background Track
  • bareform: Explosion Sound
  • sjonas88: Spawner Success Sound
  • distillerystudio: Spawner Failure Sound
  • newagesoup: Sword Woosh Sound
  • jon-k-clancy: Death Sound
  • justinvoke: Freeze Attack Sound
  • breviceps: Slow Attack Sound
  • samsterbirdies: Lazer Attack Sound
  • eminyildrim: Growth Attack Eating Sound
